original_text: And it came to pass as they came, when David was returned from the slaughter of the Philistine, that the women came out of all cities of Israel, singing and dancing, to meet king Saul, with tabrets, with joy, and with instruments of musick.
korean_text: 무리가 돌아올 때 곧 다윗이 블레셋 사람을 죽이고 돌아올 때에 여인들이 이스라엘 모든 성읍에서 나와서 노래하며 춤추며 소고와 경쇠를 가지고 왕 사울을 환영하는데

sentences.original_text: And it came to pass as they came
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 올 때에 이 일이 있었고

sentences.original_text: when David was returned from the slaughter of the Philistine
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗이 블레셋 사람을 죽이고 돌아왔을 때

sentences.original_text: that the women came out of all cities of Israel
